ip.title: Web Server IP
ip.description: the local ip address of the http server need to listen on

refresh.title: Auto Refresh Time
refresh.description: auto refresh time of the http server

log.title: Access Log
log.description: access log of the http server

file.title: Log File
file.description: the file to save the log

self_rotate.title: Self Rotate
self_rotate.description: whether to rotate the log file by self

size.title: Max Size
size.description: the max size of the log file. the log file will be rotated if the size is larger than this value

age.title: Max Age
age.description: the max age of the log file. the log file will be rotated if the age is larger than this value

backups.title: Max Backups
backups.description: the max backups of the log file. the rotated log file will be deleted if the backups is larger than this value

compress.title: Compress
compress.description: whether to compress the rotated log file

dry.title: dry
dry.description: set true to make the notification dry run and will not be sent the message

failure.title: Failure Threshold
failure.description: the failures threshold to change the status such as 3

success.title: Success Threshold
success.description: the success threshold to change the status such as 2

time.title: Time
time.description: the time of SLA report need to send out

data.title: Data File
data.description: the data file of SLA report

backups.title: Backups
backups.description: the number of backups of SLA report

name.title: EaseProbe Name
name.description: The name of the EaseProbe instance

icon.title: Icon URL
icon.description: The URL of the icon of the EaseProbe instance

pid.title: PID File
pid.description: The PID file of the EaseProbe instance ('' or '-' means no PID file)

log.description: The log settings of the EaseProbe instance

timeformat.title: Time Format
timeformat.description: The time format of the EaseProbe instance

timezone.title: Time Zone
timezone.description: The time zone of the EaseProbe instance

probe.title: Probe Settings
probe.description: The global probe settings of the EaseProbe instance

notify.title: Notify Settings
notify.description: The global notify settings of the EaseProbe instance

sla.title: SLA Report Settings
sla.description: The SLA report settings of the EaseProbe instance

http.title: HTTP Server Settings
http.description: The HTTP server settings of the EaseProbe instance

query.title: Query
query.description: XPath/Regex Expression to extract the value

strategy.description: the notification interval strategy such as regular

factor.title: Factor
factor.description: the factor to increase the interval

max.description: the max times to send notification

times.title: Retry Times
